long_description: With a solid adjustable buckle and a 22kN breaking strength, the Edelrid Adjustable Belay Station Sling makes it quick and easy to construct a reliable equalized anchor on a multipitch rock climb. Clove hitch the sling to 2 anchor points then use the buckle to adjust the length of the sling to equalize the anchor. Girth hitch the green loop to your belay loop on your harness to use sling as an adjustable personal anchor. Edelrid Adjustable Belay Station Sling can also be used as an adjustable etrier for aid climbing.
short_description: With a solid adjustable buckle and a 22kN breaking strength, the Edelrid Adjustable Belay Station Sling makes it quick and easy to construct a reliable equalized anchor on a multipitch rock climb.
